H0.text: Conducting electricity occurs when ionic compounds are dissolved in water.

H1.text: Magnetize electricity is what happens when ionic compounds are dissolved in water.

H2.text: Repel electricity occurs when ionic compounds are dissolved in water.

H3.text: Deflecting electricity is what happens when ionic compounds are dissolved in water.

A4.text: Because the solutes are charged ions they also increase the electrical conductivity of the solution.
